question: my husband calls me unauthentic and unpious, and says i am a women of the jahaliyyah, he says all our problems our my fault.if i divorce him for this (and much more) am i wrong?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Jazakallah for your question. May Allah Ta'ala in HIS infinite mercy ease your difficulties in your marriage and put love and affection in your hearts for each other. Ameen.

Sister, you say your husband considers you to be an ignorant person who is also false, impious and troublesome. I find it difficult to understand why he should have this impression of you. Do you think it will be possible to send more details so that we can try to understand what the problem is, and insha'allah work with you to heal the rift between yourself and your husband?

May Allah Ta'ala guide and protect your family. Ameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
